metadata.Title: CVE-2023-3108 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
A flaw was found in the subsequent get_user_pages_fast in the Linuxkernelâ€™s interface for symmetric key cipher algorithms in theskcipher_recvmsg of crypto/algif_skcipher.c function. This flaw allows alocal user to crash the system.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-3108` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.13.0-19-generic - 5.13.0-19.19
linux-image-5.13.0-19-generic-lpae - 5.13.0-19.19
linux-image-unsigned-5.13.0-19-generic - 5.13.0-19.19
linux-image-unsigned-5.13.0-19-generic-64k - 5.13.0-19.19
linux-image-unsigned-5.13.0-19-lowlatency - 5.13.0-19.19
No subscription required
